code: import axios from'axios';import{GET_MARKET_SUCCESS,GET_MARKET_PENDING,GET_MARKET_ERROR}from'./ActionTypes';var getMarketAPI='https://testnets-api.opensea.io/assets?asset_contract_address=0x5A027A1F234a9499a8eAf308a9d318794633d2A8&order_direction=asc';var asyncActionCreator=function asyncActionCreator(asyncTypes,promise){return function(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:asyncTypes.pending});return promise.then(function(payload){return dispatch({type:asyncTypes.complete,payload:payload.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:asyncTypes.error,error:true,payload:err});});};};};export var getMarket=asyncActionCreator({pending:GET_MARKET_PENDING,complete:GET_MARKET_SUCCESS,error:GET_MARKET_ERROR},axios.get(getMarketAPI));
